name: Pheasant Bird Hunting 3d
description:
Welcome Hunters! to the pheasant bird hunting game available on IOS. Now you are able to experience the real life pheasant hunting. This is the only adventures game which is based on pheasant hunting. You played many hunting games but pheasant bird make this game completely change.

We bring you to the pheasant shooting adventure in a realistic safari jungle and island, where you can hunt pheasant shoot. Aim precisely to shoot the pheasant birds hunting experience.
